short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your secrets with the retro Mr. Robot screensaver.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Someone is always watching you. Listening to you. Owning you. Protect your secrets from prying eyes with the retro fsociety-inspired screensaver.
